name: Warden Initiate
description: +1 Willpower, +1 Intuition; Skills: Discipline, Tracking; Gear: A traveler's cloak, a simple weapon, a Warden's token.

name: City Guard
description: +1 Toughness, +1 Presence; Skills: Guard, Intimidation; Gear: A uniform, a cudgel or spear, manacles.

name: Sky-Sailor
description: +1 Agility, +1 Finesse; Skills: Acrobatics, Tinkering; Gear: A sturdy harness, a spyglass, a set of mechanic's tools.
